title: New Season Quests Glitch?
body: I finished the quests for preseason and i got a ton of rewards. However the game did not issue me my 3 epic skin shard even tho the quest completed says  rune ward skin and 3 epic skin shards. When will i get my epic skin shards?

replies.body: Encountered this as well. I was supposed to receive 4, but got one.
This has also happened to me....was supposed to get a chest containing 4 epic skins and have nothing. Checked purchase history and it is not there? Also did not get the rune ward skin.
The toast notification might be a bit delayed, so you may need to relog to see it.  You can still confirm what you received through your client's purchase history, though.

> [{quoted}](name=MrGamesAndWatch,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Wwfz1UAn,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-11-08T17:40:22.313+0000)
>
> I finished the quests for preseason and i got a ton of rewards. However the game did not issue me my 3 epic skin shard even tho the quest completed says  rune ward skin and 3 epic skin shards. When will i get my epic skin shards?

Update: I logged out and logged back in, and three chests appeared with my skins in them, and have unlocked them all.
